<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_diagram_builder.DiagramBuilderContextMenuOptionService</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>DiagramBuilderContextMenuOptionService</name> <script><![CDATA[var DiagramBuilderContextMenuOptionService = Class.create(); DiagramBuilderContextMenuOptionService.prototype = { initialize: function() {},
type: 'DiagramBuilderContextMenuOptionService' };
DiagramBuilderContextMenuOptionService.getOptionByID = function(sysId) { var optionGr = DiagramBuilderContextMenuOption.getOptionByID(sysId);
return { sysId: optionGr.getUniqueValue(), name: optionGr.getValue(DiagramBuilderContextMenuOption.NAME), script: optionGr.getValue(DiagramBuilderContextMenuOption.SCRIPT), showOption: optionGr.getValue(DiagramBuilderContextMenuOption.VISIBILITY_CONDITION) }; };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-02-18 05:34:30</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2890f0d7535620100b0cddeeff7b12e2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>DiagramBuilderContextMenuOptionService</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Diagram Builder" source="sn_diagram_builder">1cf7ad026abf3abab12e761ddaa6e9df</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Diagram Builder">1cf7ad026abf3abab12e761ddaa6e9df</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2890f0d7535620100b0cddeeff7b12e2</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-02-18 06:44:25</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
